title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, April 20, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss describes an expedition to burn several bridges, ending in a skirmish with Federal forces and a Confederate retreat.
keywords: Troop Movement, Military Authority, Battle Description, Death/Casualties, Patriotism, Prisons/Prisoners, Church/Religious Activity, Family, Military Strategy, American Civil War
